OOC: Dewboy, stop your personal predjudices against me and just RP like a 
normal person.  Hugar even let me see your email where you state "I won't let 
LN take down one of my charaqchters even if I have to penetrate reality and 
throw void into the upper atmosphere" or something like that. To my eyes just 
by saying that you are stating you are a moder. And then in your last post 
you said "Like heck your taking down one of my charachters" which also points 
to you moding. Thank you dewboy for once again proving that you truly are 
nothing but an annoyance who can't RP his way out of a trash can without 
moding.

IC:
Being that thirst is on theground and void is standing, the kick strikes void 
at the chest causing him to stumble back a bit. In retaliation Void opens 
fire with his laser blaster at Thirsts back, firing seven shots.

--part1_150.8478360.298eb229_boundary
